meanings.definition: The liquid obtained from or present in fruits or vegetables.
meanings.sent1: Fresh juices are healthy and delicious.
meanings.sent2: She spilled the juices from the ripe watermelon.
meanings.sent3: The orange juices danced in the glass.
meanings.sent4: The juices of creativity flowed freely in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The sweet juices of the ripe mango dripped down her chin.

meanings.definition: The natural fluid of animals; any liquid resembling this.
meanings.sent1: The lion's juices dripped from its mouth after the hunt.
meanings.sent2: The juices of the meat added flavor to the stew.
meanings.sent3: The dog's juices splattered on the floor during playtime.
meanings.sent4: The juices of fear coursed through his veins.
meanings.sent5: The juices of the fresh fish glistened in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: She juices the oranges every morning for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: He juices the apples to make a refreshing drink.
meanings.sent3: The machine juices the fruits quickly and efficiently.
meanings.sent4: The chef juices the lemons for the tangy sauce.
meanings.sent5: They juice the berries to make a delicious smoothie.
